description: Try our easy to follow Pork Spring Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Spring rolls,Low saturated fat,Deep fryer,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Christmas leftovers,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Mince,Pork,Leftovers,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork Spring Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients, except wrappers together by hand in a bowl. Place a tablespoonful in the middle of the wrapper (with a corner facing you). Moisten edges with a little water. Fold over one end, fold in sides and roll up to enclose.

Heat vegetable oil in a saucepan and deep fry rolls until golden brown. If you're not sure of the oil temperature, test by dropping a piece of bread crust in the oil. It should brown in about 30 seconds.
Serve on their own or with sweet chilli dipping sauce.
